mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: manadhilE
Film: dhAyam oNNu
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n3 S

manadhilE oru pAttu
n.s n. s  n.s g  r

mazhaivarum adhai kEttu
n.s   n.s   n.s   g  r

ini boopALam
pp  m2 p p

pudhu AlOlam
p p   m2p p

vizhi poovum malarum kAlai nEram
g p   n  S   d p pm2 dp p  mrsn.

Stanza 1:
kAtRu poovOdu koodum        kAdhal sangeetham pAdum
pg p  n  n S  dp p m2dpm2g  pg p   pn nR S    dp p

pArTHu en uLLam thEdum        pAsam anbOdu moodum 
pg p   pn n S   dp p m2dpm2g  pg p  pnnRS  dp p


idhayam pOdAtha layamum kEttu 
gp  n   nSn2dp  p m2p   rm m

iLamai pAdAtha kavidhai pAttu 
gp n   nSn2dp  p m2p    mg g

imaigaLil pala thALam  isaigaLai athu koo.....Rum 
gm  g m   g m  dS dpm2 m2p m2p   m2p  n2Sn2dp p

iravilum pagalilum unai pArTHu pArTHu pArvai vAdum 
nS n S   d n2d n2  gp   n  S   d  pm2 p  p   mrsn.

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
neeyum nooRaNdu vAzha nEram ponnAga mARa 
nAnum pAmAlai pOda thOLil nAn vandhu sooda 
enathu rAgangaL ezhudhum vEdham 
pudhiya dhAhangaL vizhiyil oorum 
ezhunthu vA iLam poovE isaiyilE azhaiTHEnE 
inimaigaL thodarkathai ini sOgam yEthu theerumpOthu
